s57: As attendant-in-chief followed uprising at Feng, reached Baxia, became Cavalry Commandant, entered Han, as general with merit attacking Xiang Yu, became marquis, 3,100 households
s66: As clerk followed surrender at Pei, became Grand Coachman, constantly drove the carriage, became Teng Gong, finally pacified the realm, entered Hanzhong, protected Emperor Hui and Lu Yuan, became marquis, 6,900 households. Constantly served as Grand Coachman
s72: 7th. Yuan Guang year 2, Marquis Po year 1. 19th. Yuan Ding year 2, Marquis Po convicted of marrying princess and committing adultery with father's concubine, committed suicide, state abolished
s75: As retainer followed uprising at Hengyang, reached Baxia, became cavalry general, entered Han, pacified Three Qins, attached to Han Xin, pacified Qi, became Qi Chancellor, became marquis, 2,600 households
